node.name: F4E
node.shortdescription:
F4E is a Eclipse plug-in for the Fractal component model.
It has been created for beginners in order to facilitate softwares building with Fractal technologies.
It supports :
-editors for the Fractal ADL language
-file generation related to the Fraclet annotations
-console, Fractal Explorer and Fscript launchers
node.body:
F4E is a Eclipse plug-in for the Fractal component model.
It has been created for beginners in order to facilitate softwares building with Fractal technologies.
It supports :
-editors for the Fractal ADL language
-file generation related to the Fraclet annotations
-console, Fractal Explorer and Fscript launchers
